import numpy as np
# Test what np.where returns
arr1 = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
arr2 = np.array([1, 2, 5, 4])
result = np.where(arr1 != arr2)
print('np.where result:', result)
print('Type:', type(result))
print('Length:', len(result))
print('First element:', result[0])
print('First element type:', type(result[0]))
# Test what the VLA code creates
vla_diffs = ([2],)  # This is what the VLA code creates
print('\\nVLA diffs:', vla_diffs)
print('Type:', type(vla_diffs))
print('Length:', len(vla_diffs))
print('First element:', vla_diffs[0])
print('First element type:', type(vla_diffs[0]))

cd /tmp/tmpzv9aq_xa/astropy && python -c "
import numpy as np

# Test what np.where returns
arr1 = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
arr2 = np.array([1, 2, 5, 4])
result = np.where(arr1 != arr2)
print('np.where result:', result)
print('Type:', type(result))
print('Length:', len(result))
print('First element:', result[0])
print('First element type:', type(result[0]))

# Test what the VLA code creates
vla_diffs = ([2],)  # This is what the VLA code creates
print('\\nVLA diffs:', vla_diffs)
print('Type:', type(vla_diffs))
print('Length:', len(vla_diffs))
print('First element:', vla_diffs[0])
print('First element type:', type(vla_diffs[0]))
"
